author: Special Correspondent
text: The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 74.96 feet on Sunday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage level of the dam was 37.116 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 198 cusecs. About 6,000 cusecs of water is being released for farm activities in Cauvery Delta districts, PWD sources said.
title: Mettur level
